data.actual_result: Unable to scroll down all the way; eventually multiple messages are invisible
data.expected_result: Be able to see perfectly fine up until the latest message
data.short_description: Unable to scroll all the way down to latest message while in a Voice Channel and having sent a message
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a Voice Channel - Send a message - Try to scroll all the way down - (Opening and closing the keyword will allow you to see even less of the latest messages) - (Only fixed upon app restart)
